subject: Career
title: Maslach's Three Dimensions of Burnout
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Maslach's Three Dimensions of Burnout.

hook.text: Exhaustion alone isn't burnout. Christina Maslach discovered it's a triple threat that erodes you from three directions.

buildup.text: The Maslach Burnout Inventory measures three dimensions: emotional exhaustion, depersonalization, and reduced.

discovery.text: Exhaustion = drained. Depersonalization = cynical detachment. Reduced accomplishment = feeling ineffective despite.

twist.text: You can be exhausted but not burned out. True burnout requires all three. That's why vacations alone don't fix it.

climax.text: Maslach's framework helps you identify which dimension is affected most â€” and target your recovery.

punchline.text: Burnout has three faces. Treat the right one.

quiz.question: What are Maslach's three dimensions of burnout?
options: Emotional exhaustion, depersonalization, and reduced accomplishment
